DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study was to compare time, success rates of different tracheal tubes (standard tube and ETView VivaSight SL) for intubation with an immobilized cervical spine in a standardized manikin model.
DOC.criteria: give voluntary consent to participate in the study minimum 1 year of work experience in emergency medicine experienced emergency medicine personnel (physicians, nurses, paramedics) not meet the above criteria wrist or low back diseases
